name: Logical Numerics
description:
[Logic Series]


Logical game, with numbers

The first game of the logic series, please do look forward to the next game of the series! Make sure to look out for new games in the Logic Series!

Good way to train and sharpen your brain by assimilating into the world of logic and mathematics!

Please report bugs and glitches or give ideas to me at ccheukka@gmail.com!

How to play:

A bunch of algebras and their corresponding values and some options will be shown in the game. The options will either add or subtract a number to or from one or more algebra(s). During this process, the values of the algebras would be increased eventually. Your goal is to make them all equal to 10. No, it is not that easy as you think, just try it out yourself!
